text: Dino Da Costa (; 1 August 1931 – 10 November 2020) was a Brazilian-born Italian professional footballer. He played as a central midfielder and striker. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He made one appearance for the Italian national team in 1958. From 1948 to 1955, he made 51 appearances for Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas. Da Costa died in Verona on 10 November 2020, aged 89.E’ morto Dino Da Costa. title: Dino da Costa
